DASHBOARD_ADDLINE.message: ライン - 信号を足します
DASHBOARD_ADDLINE.description: Title of the prompt used to add a new signal

LINE_STYLE.description: The style of a line signal

LINE_HIDE_LEGEND.description: Checkbox option to hide the legend of a graph

LINE_FIX_AXES_VALUES.description: Checkbox option to fix the axis values for the line graph

LINE_LOGARITHMIC_AXES.description: Checkbox option to show logarithmic for the line graph

LINE_TIME_SERIES.description: Checkbox option to show the time series for the line graph

LINE_SHOW_POINTS.description: Checkbox option to show the points for the line graph

LINE_MAX_POINTS.message: 表示する最大ポイント (0　はすべてを表示することを意味します)
LINE_MAX_POINTS.description: Input text area for the maximum points to show in a line graph

LINE_OVERVIEW.description: Checkbox option to show an overview for the line graph

LINE_SCROLLBAR.message: スクロール・バーを表示
LINE_SCROLLBAR.description: Checkbox option to show the scrollbar for the line graph
